name: contact
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: contact
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: communication with someone, especially by speaking or writing to them regularly
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指经常通过交谈、书信的）联系，联络，交往

example.eg: "Have you been in contact with Andrew recently?" "Only by phone."
example.egtrans: “你最近跟安德鲁联系过吗？”“只是打过电话。”

example.eg: I'm still in contact with her - we write a couple of times a year.
example.egtrans: 我和她仍有联系——我们一年写几封信。

example.eg: There isn't enough contact between teachers and parents.
example.egtrans: 老师和家长间联系不够。

example.eg: I've been busy at home and have hardly had any contact with the outside world.
example.egtrans: 我一直都在家里忙乎，和外面的世界几乎没有什么联系。

example.eg: I'd hate to lose contact with my college friends.
example.egtrans: 我不愿和从前的校友失去联系。

example.eg: She finally made contact with him in Italy.
example.egtrans: 她最终在意大利和他取得了联系。

example.eg: Air traffic control lost radio contact with the pilot of the plane ten minutes before the accident.
example.egtrans: 事故发生前10分钟，空中交通管制中心失去了和飞机驾驶员的无线电联系。

example.eg: The school needs a contact number (= phone number, especially for emergencies) for parents during school hours.
example.egtrans: 学校希望有上课时间能联系到家长的电话号码。

dsense.name: contact
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the fact of two people or things touching each other

example.eg: Don't let that glue come into contact with your skin.
example.egtrans: 别让那种胶水粘到你的皮肤上。

example.eg: Have you been in contact with (= touched or been very near) anyone with the disease?
example.egtrans: 你接触过患这种病的人吗？

example.eg: He hates physical contact of any kind - he doesn't even like to shake your hand.
example.egtrans: 他讨厌任何形式的身体接触——甚至不愿和人握手。

dsense.name: contact
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a person, especially someone in a high position, who can give you useful information or introductions that will help you at work or socially
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指身居高位，能提供有用信息或引见的）熟人，（社会）关系

example.eg: I don't really know how she got the job, but I think her mother has contacts.
example.egtrans: 我不知道她到底怎么得到这份工作的，不过我想她母亲有些门路。

example.eg: He gave me the name of one of his contacts in a design firm, who offered me a job.
example.egtrans: 他给了我一个他在一家设计公司熟人的名字，我在那里得到了工作。

example.eg: We're building up (= increasing the number of) our contacts in the business.
example.egtrans: 我们在业内逐渐建立起自己的关系网。

trans_examp.trans_en: the people whose names, telephone numbers, addresses, etc. you keep, for example stored on your mobile phone

example.eg: How do you add a new contact?
example.egtrans: 如何添加新的联系人？

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: the place on your mobile phone or computer where you store people's names, telephone numbers, addresses, etc.

example.eg: Click the icon to go to contacts.
example.egtrans: 点击图标进入通讯录。

example.eg: I've added her number to my contacts.
example.egtrans: 我已经把她的号码加到我的通讯录里。

dsense.name: contact
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a part in a circuit that makes the circuit complete when it touches another part

dsense.name: contact
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a small round curved piece of transparent plastic, worn on the surface of the eye to improve your sight

dsense.name: contact
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a photograph produced by allowing light to pass through the film onto paper that is pressed tightly to it

name: contact
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to communicate with someone by calling or sending them a letter, email, etc.
trans_examp.trans_cn: （通过电话或写电子邮件等）联系，联络

example.eg: I tried to contact him at his office, but he wasn't in.
example.egtrans: 我试着给他的办公室打电话，但是他不在。

example.eg: You can contact me on (US also at) (= speak to me using the phone) 388 9146.
example.egtrans: 你可以拨3889146和我联系。

example.eg: Unless the money is paid, we will be contacting our legal department.
example.egtrans: 如果不付款，我们马上就和法律部门联系。
